user.title: Connect to Beem Energy
user.description: Enter your Beem Energy account credentials.

data_description.email: The email address used for your Beem Energy account.

solcast.title: Solar Forecasting (Optional)
solcast.description: Optionally configure Solcast for improved solar forecasting.

data_description.solcast_api_key: API key for Solcast solar forecasting. Leave blank to skip.
data_description.solcast_site_id: Solcast site identifier. Leave blank to skip.

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Beem Energy. Please check your network.
error.no_devices_found: No Beem batteries found on this account.

abort.already_configured: This Beem Energy account is already configured.

data.dry_run: Dry-run mode (log actions, don't execute them)

data_description.location_lat: Latitude of your installation. Leave blank to use Home Assistant's configured location.
data_description.location_lon: Longitude of your installation. Leave blank to use Home Assistant's configured location.
data_description.solcast_api_key: API key for Solcast solar forecasting (optional).
data_description.tariff_default_price: Default electricity price in EUR/kWh (used when not in any configured tariff period).
data_description.tariff_period_count: Number of tariff periods to configure (1-6). Each period has a time range and price.
data_description.min_soc_summer: Minimum battery state of charge in summer. Use 0 to disable, or a value between 30 and 100.
data_description.min_soc_winter: Minimum battery state of charge in winter. Use 0 to disable, or a value between 30 and 100.
data_description.water_heater_switch_entity: Entity ID of the water heater switch (optional).
data_description.water_heater_power_entity: Entity ID of the water heater power sensor (optional).
data_description.water_heater_power_w: Nominal power consumption of the water heater in watts.
data_description.panel_count: Number of distinct solar panel arrays (orientations).
data_description.smart_cftg: When enabled, dynamically toggles grid charging during off-peak hours based on battery SoC vs threshold. Allows discharge when SoC is adequate.
data_description.dry_run: When enabled, all battery and water heater commands are logged but not sent. Useful for verifying decisions before going live.

tariffs.title: Tariff Periods
tariffs.description: Configure your electricity tariff periods. Each period has a label, time range, and price.

panels.title: Solar Panel Arrays
panels.description: Configure tilt, azimuth, and peak power for each panel array.
